title: Why I am getting problem with speaker in new Pixel 3A (it happened twice till now)?
content:
I got new pixel 3A on Jan 2020 and the speaker stopped working from March 2020. I bought the phone from saturn.de on online. Anyways due to Covid Saturn was closed till May. Once they opened the servie desk, I submitted my phone for repair and they gave me back a new pixel 3A in one week. They told me I should be happy that I am receiving a new phone instead of getting the old one repaired. I started using the phone and in the next two weeks, the front speaker started creating disturbing sounds. I again went to service seek and submitted it. Now I am waiting for the last two weeks. 
If there is problem with phones why they are not checking it properly. 
Its really hell lot of work to change phone so frequently :( 
Really very bad experience with pixel.
